header.title: Welcome to vital nutrition
header.text: Health and vitality for the whole family

vitalox.title: Vitalox
vitalox.text: The path to healthy skin is different for everyone. No matter what social media shows you, it takes commitment to your routine, even in the face of set backs. We're here to make sure you stay the course with the right experts and products for you.

Loxymune.text: The path to healthy skin is different for everyone. No matter what social media shows you, it takes commitment to your routine, even in the face of set backs. We're here to make sure you stay the course with the right experts and products for you.

story.title: Supplements you can trust
story.text: Our line of supplements and vitamins consists of wellness and life style products that cover various areas such as Cardiovascular, Digestive, Brain & Neuro, Beauty & Skin Health, Bone & Joint Support and Immune support.

Journeys.title: Journeys Aren't linear
Journeys.text: The path to healthy skin is different for everyone. No matter what social media shows you, it takes commitment to your routine, even in the face of set backs. We're here to make sure you stay the course with the right experts and products for you.

news.title: Latest News
news.midTitle: This is where you'll find your responses, highlights, mentions, and new followers

newsInfo.title: Launching soon in Egypt
newsInfo.text: PharmaVital, as a part of its geographic expansion will be available soon in the Egyptian market with few of its distinguished food supplement products. The Egyptian market is very welcoming for high quality products that are furnished by PharmaVital as German products.

header.title: Who is vital nutrition
header.text: We’ve always believed that the best version of ourselves starts with the mind. That’s why we’ve dedicated the past 5 years to create great-tasting products that conveniently and effectively get us in the right state at the right time.

historySection.title: Vital nutrition
historySection.leftSide: PharmaVital FZ-LLC is the result of years of customer service experience working for pharmacies, distribution firms, and hospitals in several countries as a provider of trusted brands of food supplements with a broad range of vitamins and minerals. We’re happy to be able to offer such a broad set of quality-assured trusted brands.
historySection.rigtSide: Our company’s reputation is built on strict quality control and demanding manufacturing practices. We strive to give the highest possible quality and are motivated by our desire to serve and improve our customers’ experiences. As a new, ambitious organization, our mission is to bring high-quality items to the market at reasonable prices.

philsoSection.title: Vital nutrition
philsoSection.leftSide: To get the daily recommended vitamins and minerals, eat fruits, vegetables, animal protein, and fish. Because not everyone in our society has the ability to constantly adhere to guidelines, whether due to time constraints or other circumstances, vitamin and mineral supplements can fill the gap here.
philsoSection.rightSide: PharmaVital FZ–LLC has undertaken the task of providing high-quality supplements at reasonable prices. High-quality supplements for a joyful life for the entire family. Having a healthy lifestyle begins with eating healthy foods, and eating healthy foods begins with a healthy environment. Every day, we make better health more accessible with our products.

featuresSection.title: With over 30 million pieces sold, we’re on a mission.
featuresSection.midTitle: A mission to focus on the three things most important to us.

features.title: innovation
features.text: We are constantly improving. We have gone through close to 30 iterations, modifying formulations, ingredients and textures to ensure we are putting out the best product possible.

features.title: Quality Ingredients
features.text: We will continue to only source sustainable, high-quality ingredients to be made in our FDA-approved labs.

features.title: Giving Back
features.text: We give back 1% of everything - whether it’s time for the community, profits for a cause or product to non-profits.

formFields.privacy: By submitting this orm you are agreeing to our Privacy policy.

location.title: Looking to learn more? chat with our team.
location.midTitle: You can call us during working hours or visit our office. We will respond to your emails within 24 hours or soonest possible. Love to hear from you!
